firstBlock.title: What is VEBI?
firstBlock.text1:
Welcome to VEBI, where we believe in the power of building genuine relationships through exceptional web development and design services. We strive to create meaningful connections with our clients by understanding their unique needs and delivering remarkable solutions.

With our expertise and commitment to customer satisfaction, we aim to not only win your business but also become trusted partners in your digital success. Explore our services, and let us help you forge lasting connections in the digital world.
firstBlock.text2: Our approach is always collaborative and client-centered, ensuring that every website we build is a true reflection of your brand and meets your specific requirements.
firstBlock.text3: Whether you're launching a new website, redesigning an existing one, or simply looking for ongoing support and maintenance, we are here to help you succeed online.

secondBlock.title: Our strategy
secondBlock.text: We believe that great websites are the result of collaboration and a shared vision, which is why we always work closely with our clients to ensure that their online presence accurately reflects their brand and meets their unique needs.

thirdBlock.title: We are HIRING!
thirdBlock.text:
Interested in working with our team?
We are waiting for you.

advantages.title: Advantages
advantages.upToDate: Relevant, reliable IT and design solutions
advantages.warranty: 2 month warranty and free tech support
advantages.flex: Possibility of flexible payment, installments up to 5 months
advantages.access: You are the only one who has access

support.text: If you encounter any issues, feel free to contact us for technical support.

secondBlock.title: Warranty
secondBlock.text: With all IT services, we provide free two-month technical support, which includes: consultations, training in use, error correction and performance support.

thirdBlock.title: Flexible Payment
thirdBlock.text: Your outcome is very important to us, and we understand that flexible payment options can help you, so we offer them.

mainPage.title: VEBI | Website development, IT & Design services
mainPage.description: VEBI is a small team of skilled developers and designers directed to provide high-quality IT & design services, such as: website, app, CMS & CRM system development and design.
mainPage.keyWords: Webpage development, development services, design services, vebi

services.title: Services
services.brandDesignP: All you need for  your brand visual design. Whether you want a logo, slogan, brand palette, or maybe you need to figure out a name for your brand - VEBI will design your brand taking into account your needs and wishes.
